actions.committee: House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.

official_title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit a Member, officer, or employee of the House from distributing campaign contributions in the Hall of the House.

summary.text: Amends rule XLIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit a Member, officer, or employee of the House from distributing campaign contributions in the Hall of the House of Representatives.

titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit a Member, officer, or employee of the House from distributing campaign contributions in the Hall of the House.
